title.rendered: Monthly Update: August Report – AWC Staking Report

content.rendered:
We have gathered the last happenings and news about Atomic from August. New desktop & mobile releases, AWC staking report, AMA sessions with Qtum and ShareRing, the guide on how to claim Spark tokens airdrop. It’s a lot to tell – just give a read to our monthly report to know everything.


Desktop Release (2.19.0)

The new desktop version 2.19.0 has these features:

  • ADA blockchain entered a new era with the Shelley upgrade. The upgrade established a new address format. Please note, that your old ADA address will be automatically replaced with a new one. To transfer the balance from the old address to a new one please use the “Claim ADA’ menu  (gears icon on the coin page). The new address format will be used for ADA staking, supported in the next releases.
  • New diagram portfolio. Keep track of your portfolio and monitor your assets in a new visual format.
  • Bugfix: XVG sending fixed.

You can download Atomic here.


Mobile Release (0.63.0)

The new mobile version 0.63.0 has these features:

  • Diagram portfolio. Keep track of your portfolio and monitor your assets in a new visual format.
  • New ADA address format enabled. Your old ADA address will be automatically replaced with a new one. Transfer the balance from the old address to a new one by using the gears icon on the coin page.
  • Price chart. Follow the market trends on a completely new level without leaving the app.

You can download Atomic here.


AWC Staking

Atomic Wallet Token (AWC) staking is now a popular opportunity among AWC holders who want to start getting passive income. So far, there are 6926 holders who stake and get the rewards from a minimum of 10 AWC deposit with a maximum 23% yearly profit. 169,290 AWC rewards were paid for 3 months that the program is out! Try it with a mobile app or a desktop version.

Stake AWC and earn up to 23%.


How to Airdrop the Spark Tokens

The world’s first turing complete FBA network Flare announced that it will airdrop XRP via its native token Spark. Check out our step-by-step guide to know how to claim Spark with the XRP key from Atomic wallet as soon as the chain is launched.


AMAs in August

This month, we hosted the AMA sessions with Qtum and ShareRing teams in our Telegram chat. You’re welcome to read the digests:

Qtum

ShareRing


Support Work in August

In August our support team reacted to 12,599 issues in 36 minutes on average. We’re constantly getting reviews on the service, and happily improving it day by day. In case of any problem, reach us by email or live chat widget on our website. Atomic support service works for you 24/7.
